Recipe.title: Bread-Machine Sandwich Bread
Recipe.Description:
Fresh bread-machine bread tastes wonderful! But it makes lousy sandwiches because it crumbles and falls apart. I once found out that Vital Wheat Gluten can be used to "fix" this. I added a bunch and ended up with a loaf of bread that looked and smelled good, but was the consistency of rubber. &smiley;
After a bit of trial and error, I finally came up with this recipe which holds together well without having a nasty consistency.

section.instruction:
Add ingredients to bread machine, in this order, without mixing:
Milk and Oil
All other dry ingredients, except Yeast
Yeast
May set delay up to 8 hours.

Notes.note: For ease, you can pre-mix the dry ingredients and store them in a Ziplock Bag, or something similar.

Modifications.modification:
If you are going to use a delay-time of longer than 8 hours:
Use Water instead of Milk.
Add 2 Tablespoons Dry Milk to the Dry ingredients.
